column5: Just cant believe how fast this year passed. I always get a bit retrospective this time of the year.I look back over the year, and filter out all the good things that happened, and embrace and accept all the bad things before discarding them. I am then left with good memories to help start the new year. I wish each and every one of you a Healthy and Happy New Year. My only resolution, if you can call it that, is to do my best to slow down my life. To appreciate every second of it,good or bad, and try to live each day to the fullest.
Wish you and yours a Happy, Healthy and Prosperous New Year Paul!!!  As for New Years resolution... well I'm going to be fishing as much as possible and hope for the best
Happy New Year to you and your wife Paul and to everyone else on here.  My New Years resolution is to get out of here, get better and then go fishing more then this year.
Happy New year Paul. Now to tackle the new dishwasher, no wait I'll do it Monday!
For the way i feel about 2011 and how i wish to reflect apon it , i chose to hold my comments til the day after tomorrow ,but heres a HAPPY NEW YEARS to you and yours Paul
Happy New year to you Paul, and your better half
Thx for wishes Paul.  No resolutions for me.. I'm at peace with my faults.
I'm with you Chad... I'm just gonna grab each day and run with it 'cause '09, '10 and '11 were just a blur!
Dont embrace it too much Paul....ive heard ya can go blind  Happy New Years to all and may your hang overs be worse than mine  On a more serious note......CHEERS!!!!!!!!!!
here here Paul, slow and steady wins the race!!!  Happy New year all!!!
Be safe out there everyone.I would like to share 2012 with all of you.Dont drink and drive.

2 am, had an amazing 8- hour dinner with friends, no driving, next door! hope all went as well withIn the OFC. spending tomorrow with the kids and grandkids. Let's hope 2012 will bring us health and quality of life for us all.

I was DD for probably the first time ever. I must be getting frugal with age because I couldn't imagine paying 50 for the cab or waiting two hours for it, and there was NO chance I was drinking and driving. Forget that, I just won't drink and I'll hold focused conversations with myself. It actually feels good to buck the trend and not participate in a worldwide hangover. I'm going fishing today, fresh as a daisy. Happy new year

Happy New Year all, may 2012 bring you good health and fat fish.    - only 12 weeks left till the boat gets a sping service - maybe less if it stays this warm. Hopefull the late arrival of winter wont mean a late departure.
I hear that...  I'm going fishing in 10 minutes...  I never drink on new years...
Doesn't feel bad at all does it.No hangover,being tired etc. There was a time not so long ago I wouldn't even think about being a DD.Times sure change don't they.
Yup, you got that right. Its not a bad feeling  MM: you are a pillar of self control! Good luck out there today!
Glad to see everyone made it safely into 2012.

Happy New Year Paul !!! And to everyone else.  I went out last night to our second oldest's spanish nite club that she works at. I was once again DD and had a great time. Being a DD does have it's draw backs though, like a really sore neck.

Glad to hear every one is safe and new years was a hit but , i just snuck in here to get away from reading all the old year rearend reviews , i am tired of looking at rearend reviews . I am ready to grab 2012 by the horns and giv'er.
:rofl2: I caught that one.
